string-array.name: subHeading
string-array.item: Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right.
Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.
The best way out is always through
Imagination is more important than knowledge
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight
A leader is a dealer in hope
Make it happen now, not tomorrow. Tomorrow is a loser’s excuse
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now

string-array.name: content
string-array.item: Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right ~ Marian Wright Edelman
Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success ~ Napoleon Hill
The best way out is always through ~ Robert Frost
Imagination is more important than knowledge ~ Albert Einstein
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams ~ Eleanor Roosevelt
Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight ~ Benjamin Franklin
A leader is a dealer in hope ~ Napoleon Bonaparte
Make it happen now, not tomorrow. Tomorrow is a loser’s excuse ~ Andrew Fashion
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now ~ Chinese proverb
